resources.string: Press the play button above to generate an activation tone and begin receiving data from your TPMS sensor for processing.
Valid Binary String Not Received from TPMS; please try again
Sending Sensor Data to Fleet Cents
This application provides for reading and archiving TPMS data from contemporary tire samples. For more information, please contact Fleet Cents.
Wrong arguments were supplied! Please, check the rtl_sdr manual!
Invalid USB file descriptor passed via Java.
No compatible SDR devices found (make sure your USB device is connected, properly powered and your phone/tablet supports USB host mode).
A compatible device was found, but cannot be opened.
Your Android device does not provide enough power to the dongle. You must use an externally powered USB hub or an externally powered USB OTG cable.
Internal error: A filename for temporarily storing RF samples was not provided
Internal error: A file for temporarily storing RF samples could not be written to the file system in the location identified
No network access found. Enable internet access and please try again.
Processing server not found; check the Base Station in the Preferences, and your internet access, and please try again.
An unexpected error has occurred. If this error continues, please contact the application developer.
